snippet: Coca-Cola shares fell 4.8 percent after the company reported another decline in revenue, while Discover Financial Services rose 8.2 percent.
abstract: Stocks rise for third day on gains by financial and energy companies.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola shares fell 4.8 percent after the company reported another decline in revenue, while Discover Financial Services rose 8.2 percent.

headline.main: Market Inches Up, Following Oil Prices Higher
headline.print_headline: Buoyed by Oil, Market Extends Gains
